Description: Verify that the Cyber form displays the correct title
Step Description: 1. Navigate to Cyber forms 2. Load the form page
Expected Result: Form title should display correctly without any truncation or formatting issues

Test Case Name: Verify incorrect form title is not displayed
Description: Verify that any incorrect or outdated form title does not appear
Step Description: 1. Navigate to Cyber forms 2. Check for any incorrect titles
Expected Result: No incorrect titles should be visible on the form page

Description: Verify that form title field accepts and displays correct character length
Step Description: 1. Open form configuration 2. Check title field properties 3. Verify character limit
Expected Result: Form title should have appropriate character limit and display complete title

Description: Verify that form title correctly handles special characters
Step Description: 1. Enter form title with special characters (!@#$%^&*) 2. Save form 3. Verify display
Expected Result: Special characters should be properly encoded and displayed

Test Case Name: Validate form title with Unicode characters
Description: Verify that form title correctly handles Unicode/international characters
Step Description: 1. Enter form title with Unicode characters 2. Save form 3. Verify display
Expected Result: Unicode characters should display correctly without corruption

Description: Verify system behavior when form title is empty
Step Description: 1. Leave form title field empty 2. Attempt to save form 3. Check validation message
Expected Result: System should display error message or use default title

Test Case Name: Validate form title with whitespace only
Description: Verify system behavior when form title contains only whitespace
Step Description: 1. Enter only spaces in form title 2. Attempt to save form 3. Check validation
Expected Result: System should reject whitespace-only entries or trim whitespace

Test Case Name: Validate form title with HTML tags
Description: Verify that form title does not execute HTML tags
Step Description: 1. Enter form title with HTML tags (<script>) 2. Save form 3. Verify display
Expected Result: HTML tags should be escaped or sanitized and displayed as text

Description: Verify that form title maintains correct case when saved
Step Description: 1. Enter form title with mixed case 2. Save form 3. Retrieve and verify case
Expected Result: Form title case should be preserved as entered

Test Case Name: Verify form title update in UI
Description: Verify that form title changes are reflected in UI immediately
Step Description: 1. Open Cyber form 2. Update form title 3. Verify update reflects on page
Expected Result: Updated form title should display in real-time without page refresh

Test Case Name: Validate form title length with very long string
Description: Verify form title behavior with extremely long strings
Step Description: 1. Enter 500+ character string as form title 2. Save form 3. Check display
Expected Result: System should truncate or wrap long titles appropriately

Test Case Name: Validate form title with numeric values
Description: Verify that form title correctly handles numeric-only entries
Step Description: 1. Enter numeric string as form title 2. Save form 3. Verify display
Expected Result: Numeric form titles should be accepted and displayed correctly

Test Case Name: Verify form title consistency across pages
Description: Verify that form title displays consistently across all form pages
Step Description: 1. Navigate through Cyber form pages 2. Check title on each page
Expected Result: Form title should remain consistent across all pages

Test Case Name: Verify form title in exported/printed format
Description: Verify that form title displays correctly when form is exported or printed
Step Description: 1. Export Cyber form to PDF 2. Print form 3. Verify title in output
Expected Result: Form title should display correctly in exported and printed formats

Test Case Name: Validate form title with SQL injection attempts
Description: Verify that form title field is protected against SQL injection
Step Description: 1. Enter SQL injection payload in form title 2. Save form 3. Verify no execution
Expected Result: SQL payloads should be sanitized and displayed as text
